greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: a(n) = the largest k < n for which A264977(k) = A264977(n), or 0 if no such k exists.
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..65537
program: (define (A277815 n) (if (zero? n) n (let ((v (A264977 n))) (let loop ((k (- n 1))) (cond ((zero? k) 0) ((= v (A264977 k)) k) (else (loop (- k 1))))))))
xref: Cf. A264977, A277695, A277814, A277817 (the positions of zeros).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 06 2016
